name: Hands on Experience
description:
Made with Andrea Hayes and Sean Goncalves, as part of the 72 hour NAG game jam 2015. Because it was a Jam I found myself doing both code and art.
The finalist games, which this was, were featured at the Rage festival.
The game came second overall.

The game, built around the theme "don't touch that" requires the player to touch artifacts in a museum display.
The person who touches the objects the most receives "enlightenment". Players can break objects and push the players hand to stop them from scoring.

For Two players sharing a single remote.

Read more about it here: http://www.nag.co.za/2015/10/08/heres-a-list-of-your-nag-jam-finalists/

Or here: http://www.nag.co.za/2015/10/14/makin-games-makin-memories-nag-jam-winners-and-final-thoughts/
